item.description:
SPEED DATING FOR DYKES
Saturday April 11
7:00 PM
Machine Nightclub
1254 Boylston St, Boston

$15 Includes speed dating, cover for dancing at DykeNightâ€™s Second Saturdays, and free coat check!

Spring is around the corner! Meeting hotties doesn't get any easier than this. You get 4 minutes with a bunch of different singles, we provide conversation topics to get you started and a painless way at the end of the evening to tell the cuties you liked that, well, that you like 'em. Better than that, you'll support the Boston Dyke March!

First come, first serve. Seats fill up fast, so get in line before 7:00 pm.

For more information:
dykemarch@gmail.com
bostondykemarch.com
http://lgbtfriends.me...

This speed dating events is a fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March. Please support DykeNight, our speed dating co-sponsor.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March
